title: Godlovesyou
author: Godlovesyou
content: OK my people, we actually passed out from one year NYSC on 2nd of March and my certification was held back due to accused absence from service for one month.What happen is that I did my biometric clearance on the second to last month of our passing out and someone I did have a clue where I must have match him or her reported me to zonal Inspector that I was absent since the whole month from my PPA (place of primary assignment) and that's how I was suggested to face panel and judgment is finally made in my favour because the reporter suggested not to be mentioned and my PPA Corp members and the head of department stood for me to have been faithful in my service.Today God has put my enemies to shame. I came back home to meet my grandma who took care of me since my mother die. I dedicate the certificate to her and I pray to make her proud. We celebrate together with joy and happiness as we slaughter chicken along. All thanks to God.Congratulations to me and grandma.

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: Congratulations bro, e no actually de easy to pass through university and graduate, talk less of going through one year of service, I wish you a favor Labor market because we know how Nigeria they be, plenty graduates everywhere and work no de to do, most of us wey de here don pass through sch, na conditions and the love of Bitcoin make us de here, but lastly I wish our country go change soon, make we get better works they do.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 06, 2023, 05:45:23 PMWhat happen is that I did my biometric clearance on the second to last month of our passing out and someone I did have a clue where I must have match him or her reported me to zonal Inspector that I was absent since the whole month from my PPA (place of primary assignment) and that's how I was suggested to face panel and judgment is finally made in my favour because the reporter suggested not to be mentioned and my PPA Corp members and the head of department stood for me to have been faithful in my service.Frm d way u narrate dis ur tori, watin I dey get b say, na ur fellow Corp member 4ward u 2 d panel o! Na fk o, why pple dey behav lik dat 4 dat smal service matter. Tank God life no end 4 service shah, na d after dey shw hw all ur waka bin don b.Meanwhile, I hope say u no follow collect d least 4 d election matter way corper dey change result so o. Dats if u bin serve as PO POA shah.Meanwhile, congratulations. E no east 2 go live 4 anode man land nd culture 4 1year. Na time pack lik dat o, 1year. U don triumph nd na nw u b correct naija person.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: Em no d easy to have a successful service year for this country. Congratulations to you sha. You see as you take serve finish, responsibilities don d your hand to begin to cater for yourself and your grandmother wey train to you. You see as she don train you to be graduate, so no kukuma engage yourself in mischievous act for fast money. Make you keep your head straight and hustling legitimately so that God go bless and continue to fight for you against your enemies wey wan pull you down. My prayers for you be sae make God bless and keep your grandma strong for you as you continue to make am proud for this life.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Congratulations OP. I'm thankful to God for you. It is not easy to spend 4-5 years in school and finally made it to NYSC to serve your fatherland, so It's worth celebrating and thanking God. This period is one of the defining moments of your life and I hope you make the best of it. Once again a very big congratulations to you üëè

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 06, 2023, 05:45:23 PMOK my people, we actually passed out from one year NYSC on 2nd of March and my certification was held back due to accused absence from service for one month.What happen is that I did my biometric clearance on the second to last month of our passing out and someone I did have a clue where I must have match him or her reported me to zonal Inspector that I was absent since the whole month from my PPA (place of primary assignment) and that's how I was suggested to face panel and judgment is finally made in my favour because the reporter suggested not to be mentioned and my PPA Corp members and the head of department stood for me to have been faithful in my service.Today God has put my enemies to shame. I came back home to meet my grandma who took care of me since my mother die. I dedicate the certificate to her and I pray to make her proud. We celebrate together with joy and happiness as we slaughter chicken along. All thanks to God.Congratulations to me and grandma.Congratulations to your successful POP. It is not easy though. I could remember my service year as the CDs President. I faced lots of challenges of people complaints and activities. It was by the grace of God I was able to make a good leadership without fear or favor but all through many recommendations and commendations came my way and my POP/hand over was a successful one too. Let me tell you the truth is was your own Corp member that reported you out of envy and greed. I have faced many panels of that nature defending people and to the glory of God non of them were held down nor victimized for any reason and till today many of them are my friends and they call me always. We have built strong relationship and some bringing business as well.¬†I will quote you so that your picture will be viewable so that others can see it.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: Congratulations, I'm so much happy for you,going through school for years is not easy, the stress, sleepless nights etc, Thanks to God you finally came out successfully...

comments.author: Silver005
comments.body: A very big congratulations to you my brother, it's not easy at all, it's the lord's doing my brother not your own power but the grace of God you made it, once again congratulations,and now that you have finally made it remember not to forget those who stood by you to make sure you made it and become somebody..

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: I happy for you brother and I pray make God bless your certificate very well, make you reap the fruit of your labour. E no easy to pass through school for dis country successfully, the ups and down, the suffering for school e too much for person to give thanks to Almighty at the end. Your Grandmother try to sponsor your education after your mum passed away, I pray she lives long to enjoy the fruit of her labour. Success in all you do brother.

comments.author: RockBell
comments.body: Bro a big congratulation to you and your family the journey was not actually easy but God see you through I know say even your grandma go they proud of you because no be small accomplishment be this, i wish you good luck in the labor market and has thing be now you just try they make use of any small opportunity wey you get oh this country now done become a land of survival, as the matter be now everybody done wise up for the country so make you no carry last.

comments.author: Nheer
comments.body: Congratulations man i am really happy for you. To be a graduate in Nigeria now no be small thing because of the way strike issues de come up someone will spend almost 7years to run a course that is supposed to be just 4years so congratulations again as you don join dem for labour market i wish you good luck and i pray you get a job soon. As i don de my final semester now I no fit wait make i get that feeling too as a corper make i make my Mama proud too.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Congratulations to you,I feel happy to dey see people we dey jump and pass the pit wey their enemies dig for them. Imagine say them no support you for your charge we gum you,na extra year without stipends na him you for pass through. God don do am for you and your grandpa,I beg make grandma proud and make you take your forum activities serious because the way Naija dey now no job for the people wey graduate since ten years ago come talkless of people we just graduate. This forum fit take care of you for now till you get a good job.Gracia

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: Quote from: Hyphen(-) on March 06, 2023, 07:29:08 PMCongratulations bro, e no actually de easy to pass through university and graduate, talk less of going through one year of service, I wish you a favor Labor market because we know how Nigeria they be, plenty graduates everywhere and work no de to do, most of us wey de here don pass through sch, na conditions and the love of Bitcoin make us de here, but lastly I wish our country go change soon, make we get better works they do. Na true ooh my brother, many people dey Nigeria wey their lives end for street after they graduate, and up to now they never get work, as the people wey first graduate never get work how people wey dey do service go dey think say if he or she graduate he go get work? this is one of the issue that makes some young people to not interest in education anymore and started saying school is a scam, and this is cause by our leaders because they are very selfish.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: A big congratulations to you brother, Indeed, for the kind country wey we dey today, person wey go school, come out, enter university, finish and come out, con go youth service, finish and come out safely without any problems, make that person dey thank God oooh, because this na the same journey wey make don try go through but lost their life or sanity health on the way.So I am very happy for you brother, I dey wish you nothing but good luck to opportunities from now on, and I believe say God no go let you see shame of any kind, you go surely make your grandma proud by the special grace of God upon your life, and abeg, accept my condolences for your mum.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Things like this sometimes come up just to question one's integrity, and they mostly happen in the mist of a group of people carrying out teamwork. probably because you are doing better than the person; they might just look for a way to make you look bad in the eyes of others, but there is always that joy when you are vindicated and your integrity is being proven. Congratulations to you, brother; as a Christian, I know our God is indeed good.

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: For dis life na so bad belle people just full for evry corner. Dis person wey alleged this report no go pass your¬† fellow corp member wey dey inside same PPA wit you. But the button line be say the God we dey serve big pass our enemies, for Dem go only try but no go succeed.To serve this naija for one year inno easy talk more of adding one more month ontop dat suffer year, so my brother man congratulations in your good success and welcome to the favour-market. Tried the mind and beware of the people you associate with cos no be evry bodi be your true paddi man.¬† And anywer you find urself always dey faithful and sincerely cos people dey watch your lifestyle and am sure say na that beta lifestyle you exhibit for ur PPA na make ur sch HOD and other people stand out to defend you.CONGRATULOBIA!!!

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: Many congratulations to you. I can only imagine the trauma you must have past through during that ordeal. Talk about having a repeat year in NYSC because someone who obviously must have felt jilted by you wanted to get back at you. And your colleagues who stood by you and defended you are the real MVPs. It goes to show that you were present and carried out your responsibilities dutifully. Congratulations once again.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: NYSC POP be like admission once you gain it everyone tells you congratulations, but then it comes with alot of responsibilities, e.g as a student when you gain admission the whole world celebrate with you but only you will have to work ypur way to success by studying hard to pass all the exam to qualify for graduation.-Same goea with NYSC POP everyone celebrate you but only yoj will have to figure out what life after school will be for you, no more stipend from friends and family, infact family expectations started already.-In your own case, your grandma have done well to have seen you through scholl and now is the time for her to rip some love, that is the more reason you need to stay focused and dedicated to your goals.--So mate all the best and congratulations, stay focus and draw your compass well, e go set wen the time dey right.

comments.author: Victorybit1
comments.body: May all who plan evil against us be put to shame. Congratulations on your passing out of NYSC. Welcome to the favour market.

comments.author: karmamiu
comments.body: Congratulations to you bro. I know it's very hard to graduate and have a decent education while working specially in 3rd world countries, but I still applaud you for not backing out and still pursuing it. Just keep your head held high bro and your feet on the ground, for sure one day you will receive so many blessings you have never expected. Cheers bro from the Philippines!!
